CustomField.description: 5 - Inability to deliver, business case/objective not viable 4 - Substantial delay, key deliverable not met, incur costs 3 - Delay, increased cost in excess of tolerance 2 - Small delay, small increased cost, but absorbable 1 - Insignificant changes, re-planning may be required
